Class PlanetsCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.AdventureCard
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.PlanetsCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlanetsCard extends AdventureCard
Represents a Planets adventure card.

This card allows players to land on one of several unvisited Planets to collect resources. Each planet has a limited number of slots and can only be visited once. When all players have made their choices or the planets are full, the state transitions.

If a player does not land on any planet, they lose a certain number of days as penalty.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • PlanetsCard

      public PlanetsCard(String id, AdventureCard.Type type, int lostDays, ArrayList<Planet> planets)
      Constructs a new PlanetsCard with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the card.
      type - the card type (e.g., AdventureCard.Type.LEVEL1 or AdventureCard.Type.LEVEL2).
      lostDays - the number of days lost if a player does not land on a planet.
      planets - the list of planets available for landing (must be 2–4 unvisited planets).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of planets is out of bounds or if any planet is already visited.
      NullPointerException - if the list or any planet is null.
